original_title: Wheat flour price down by Rs. 10 from tonight
original_body_lines: Wheat flour manufacturing companies have decided to reduce the retail price of a kilogram of wheat flour by Rs. 10 from tonight and said all agents have been informed of this.
Accordingly, a kilo of wheat flour will be sold to agents at a price of Rs. 210, and the maximum retail price in the market will be Rs. 230. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
